## n8n@0.84.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.83.0...n8n@0.84.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-09-23 - Enhanced nodes - Twitter: Added support for auto mention of users in reply tweets - Bug Fixes - Google Sheets: Fixed issue with non-Latin sheet names - HubSpot: Fixed naming of credentials - Microsoft: Fixed naming of credentials - Mandrill: Fixed attachments with JSON parameters - Expressions now use short variables when selecting input data for the current node - Fixed issue with renaming credentials for active workflows
